Hikayesi güzel, espriler şakalar komiklikler  falan da var. Beyin yorar,  bazı bölümler çileden çıkartır. 1.5 saat geçemediğiniz bölümü arkadaşınız gelip 10 dk da geçer. 2 kişilik bölümler de çok zevkli. Alın oynayın oynatın. Gaben reisin altından kalkabildiği nadir oyunlardan. (ufak tavsiye, başta güzel geçerken ben ilerledikçe ben salağım geçemiyorum dememek için kısa molalar verin, tek oturuşta başlayıp bitirenleri tanıyorum,  onlara saygı duyun beyinlerinden öpün. )

Back in my day we had to WALK places, Now you kids get portals??

In all seriousness if you haven't played this game what the fuck are you doing.

One of the best puzzle games I ever played. Better than the first game, the co-op version has also completely different levels compared to singleplayer stages, that's why you need to play with a friend to complete the all phases in the game.

Since the co-op version has 2 players, it has 4 different portals to deal with. Especially last levels need a incredible brain storm to pass it with your friend. I'd definetely recommand this game to play if your friend is not working for a company in human resources .
Отличное продолжение отличной игры!
Um jogo muito bom,uma historia maravilhosa,e muito divertido com seus puzzles...10/10

不愧為valve出品，儘管永遠數不到三，但遊戲品質依然優秀，
就算是好幾年前的東西，還是歷久彌新，堪稱經典之作

Que puedo decir, juego fantástico, con historia fantástica, jugabilidad fantástica, y con uno mis villanos favoritos en todo videojuego alguna, GLaDOS es la puta polla como personaje y como todo. Debo admitir que los puzles pueden ser un poco fácil, claro, yo me perdí muchas veces… pero eso es porque soy un manco de mierda, un jugador promedio se pasara este juego en menos de 10 horas. Pero bueno, Valve tiene una habilidad para hacer secuelas, Half Life 2, Left 4 Dead 2, PORTAL 2, Team fortress 2, todos ellos son mejores que sus precuelas, cuantas ganas tengo que vuelvan a hacer juegos. Algo que me gustó mucho en ese juego, y aquí entran los SPOILERS, es que nos explicaran el origen de GLados como Caroline, es un muy buen añadido. El final es muy satisfactorio, como Chell y GLados hacen los pases y técnicamente nos hecha de las instalaciones es putamente genial, seguramente me maten por esto, pero personalmente me gusto más que el Half Life 2, y eso es mucho decir, ya que es un juego que me fascina. 10/10, BUENISIMO
Me dio nauseas pero me gusto, excelente final!

Если надоест основная ветка кампании, можно посмотреть мультики около лифтов. Какого черта они такие залипательные?

В общем, крайне рекомендую. Игра со своей атмосферой и уникальным геймплеем. Очень похоже на эффект от Симс, когда играешь в первый раз думаешь: "А что так можно было?". Самобытная штука. Плюс юмор, сюжет и общее исполнение отлично дополняют и не оставляют тебе выбора, кроме как пройти до конца не отрываясь от экрана.

It's great fun for a few hours and the story is great, even if it's only around 12h long. The co-op mode is well made and also has a good story, if you have friends who play this game, definitely check it out. The community has also made great test chambers on the workshop.

Nahezu Zeitlos, dieses Spiel ist eigentlich ein Titel, welcher sich mit vielen AAA messen kann. Aber wer würde heute noch Battlefield 3 anfangen zu Spielen? Portal hingegen hat mich nichts in sachen Grafikeffekten vermissen lassen.

One would think Valvee would have a hard time topping a game as utterly lovely as portal...
and then they give us portal 2.
With everything that made the first game great and so much more to make it better, sucah as longer, more absorbing story, beautifully built co-op mode and a workshop where users from all over the world carft labours of love. 10/10 must buy

This game is a great puzzle game which might seem obvious, but the puzzles are the most unique i've ever seen in any game. The puzzles will certainly seem easy at the beginning, but passing the the first few puzzles will lead to harder puzzles and new mechanics too. The co-op is fun too and... I have not personaly tried it, but i've seen videos and they are pretty difficult. But if your a great puzzle solver and this is easy well there is also a story that you can follow along with so pay attention to the story line. If you do get this I hope you have fun and enjoy your gameplay

Hands down my favorite video game of all time, Portal 2 is a delightful blend of creative and engaging story telling with increasingly challenging problem-solving gameplay. The CoOp portion in particular will test friendships in unusual ways! The continued support of the community to create new puzzles keeps the game interesting and fresh.
